properties.name: dispatch4j.custom-executor-bean-name
properties.description: Name of a custom executor bean to use instead of the default one.

properties.name: dispatch4j.delegate-security-context
properties.description: Whether to delegate security context in async operations.

properties.name: dispatch4j.async.core-pool-size
properties.description: Core pool size for the async executor.

properties.name: dispatch4j.async.max-pool-size
properties.description: Maximum pool size for the async executor.

properties.name: dispatch4j.async.queue-capacity
properties.description: Queue capacity for the async executor.

properties.name: dispatch4j.async.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: Thread name prefix for the async executor.
